wordpressPage.title: Top Trumps (Strengths & Weaknesses)
wordpressPage.content:
You’ll need a pack of top trumps for this one!

1 – Play top trumps with your group

2 – If you were making a ‘top trump’ for yourself what would be…

– Your strength?

– Your weakness?

(As an alternative to the above you could get your group to create a ‘top trump’ for themselves)

3 – How do you think God can use these?

Bible Verse: Philippians 4:13

4 – What do you think of this verse?

5 – What does it tell us about how we can approach the things we feel weakest in?
